content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I have having a hard time feeling safe in any public place, especially where crowds gather and in locations that are not familiar.
I' m sorry to hear that. I know that public spaces can be very scary, especially when there are crowds and things aren' t familiar. What kinds of things have you found making you feel like this?
I have few companion, such as a family member or friend, to go with.

That sounds like a great plan, to be sure that you have good enough support in place and know what to expect. Have you ever tried talking to an online friend or family member about how you are feeling? I know some people will find this helpful.
